languages.text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It makes a character's rational arguments more convincing and allows them to notice any logical inconsistencies in other people's words. Also, it helps to operate cogitators more efficiently. May give access to new dialogue options.
languages.original_text:
Этот навык зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g}.
Он позволяет приводить более рациональные доводы в диалогах, подмечать логические несоответствия в словах собеседника и более эффективно использовать когитаторы. Может дать доступ к новым репликам в диалогах.

traits.locale_text:
This skill depends on Intelligence characteristic.
It makes your rational arguments more convincing and allows to notice any logical inconsistencies in other people's words. Also, it helps to operate cogitators more efficiently. May give access to new dialogue options.

This skill depends on Intelligence characteristic.
It makes your rational arguments more convincing and allows to notice any logical inconsistencies in other people's words. Also, it helps to operate cogitators more efficiently. May give access to new dialogue options.

It makes a character's rational arguments more convincing and allows to notice any logical inconsistencies in other people's words. Also, it helps to operate cogitators more efficiently. May give access to new dialogue options.

It makes a character's rational arguments more convincing and allows them to notice any logical inconsistencies in other people's words. Also, it helps to operate cogitators more efficiently. May give access to new dialogue options.

languages.text:
Diese Fertigkeit wird durch die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaft{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} beeinflusst.
Sie macht die rationalen Argumente eines Charakters überzeugender und ermöglicht es, logische Ungereimtheiten in den Aussagen anderer Personen zu erkennen. Außerdem hilft sie dabei, die Cogitatoren effizienter zu betreiben. Kann Zugang zu neuen Dialogoptionen ermöglichen.
languages.original_text:

It makes a character's rational arguments more convincing and allows them to notice any logical inconsistencies in other people's words. Also, it helps to operate cogitators more efficiently. May give access to new dialogue options.

traits.locale_text:
Diese Fertigkeit wird durch die Eigenschaft Intelligenz beeinflusst.
Sie macht die rationalen Argumente eines Charakters überzeugender und ermöglicht es, logische Ungereimtheiten in den Aussagen anderer Personen zu erkennen. Außerdem hilft sie dabei, die Cogitatoren effizienter zu betreiben. Kann Zugang zu neuen Dialogoptionen ermöglichen.

languages.text:
Cette compétence repose sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
Elle rend plus convaincants les arguments rationnels d'un personnage et permet de déceler les incohérences dans les propos de quelqu'un. Elle permet également d'utiliser plus efficacement les cogitateurs. Peut donner accès à de nouvelles options de dialogue.
languages.original_text:

It makes a character's rational arguments more convincing and allows them to notice any logical inconsistencies in other people's words. Also, it helps to operate cogitators more efficiently. May give access to new dialogue options.

traits.locale_text:
Cette compétence repose sur la caractéristique Intelligence.
Elle rend plus convaincants les arguments rationnels d'un personnage et permet de déceler les incohérences dans les propos de quelqu'un. Elle permet également d'utiliser plus efficacement les cogitateurs. Peut donner accès à de nouvelles options de dialogue.

languages.text:
此技能受{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}影响。
此技能可以使角色的理性论点更有说服力，同时留意到其他人话语中的逻辑矛盾。此外，此技能可以让角色更有效地操作沉思者。此技能可能提供新的对话选项。
languages.original_text:

It makes a character's rational arguments more convincing and allows them to notice any logical inconsistencies in other people's words. Also, it helps to operate cogitators more efficiently. May give access to new dialogue options.

traits.locale_text:
此技能受智力属性影响。
此技能可以使角色的理性论点更有说服力，同时留意到其他人话语中的逻辑矛盾。此外，此技能可以让角色更有效地操作思考器。此技能可能提供新的对话选项。

languages.original_text: This skill is used to solve problems, decipher puzzles, operate cogitators, and deal with other situations involving demonstration and inference.

languages.text:
Esta habilidad se basa en la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} del personaje.
Hace que los argumentos racionales del personaje sean más convincentes y le permite detectar inconsistencias en la lógica de las palabras de otras personas. También ayuda a la hora de tratar con cogitadores. Puede abrir nuevas opciones de diálogo.

languages.text:
このスキルは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}の影響を受ける。
これにより、キャラクターの合理的な議論に説得力が増し、他の人民の言葉の論理的矛盾に気づける。さらに、考算機がより効果的に動くようにする。新しいダイアログオプションにアクセスするだろう。

これにより、キャラクターの合理的な議論に説得力が増し、他の人民の言葉の論理的矛盾に気づける。さらに、考算機がより効果的に動くようにする。新しいダイアログオプションにアクセスするだろう。

languages.text:
Bu yetenek, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliğine{/g} dayalıdır.
Karakterin rasyonel iddialarını daha ikna edici kılar ve başkalarının sözlerindeki mantıksal tutarsızlıkları fark edilebilmesini sağlar. Ayrıca kavramsayarların daha verimli kullanılabilmesine olanak tanır. Yeni diyalog seçeneklerine erişim sağlayabilir.
